turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you give me a hand ordering dinner for my party tonight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, no problem. What were you thinking?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to keep it simple. Order some pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sounds good. From where do you want me to order them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go ahead and order them from Federici's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. How many?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order 4 please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4? Are you sure that will be enough.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. 4 should be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, any toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets keep two of them plain and the other 2 pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What time do you want me to have them delivered.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 6 o'clock.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so 4 pizzas, 2 plain and 2 pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And delivered at 6, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and have them put it on my account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, will do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
